function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of smartphone technology for diagnosis and imaging may lead to misinterpretation of medical images and misdiagnosis of contagious diseases like COVID-19.","Impact":"Misdiagnosis can lead to improper treatment and further spread of the disease.","Mitigation":"Ensuring proper training and guidelines for using mobile technology in diagnosis and imaging. Implementing quality control measures for image transmission and interpretation.","Technologies":"Quality control software for medical imaging, training programs for healthcare professionals on using mobile technology for diagnosis.","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health agencies."},{"Description":"Increased reliance on telemedicine and mobile technology for healthcare consultations may result in inadequate physical examination and assessment of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Missed or delayed diagnosis of contagious diseases, leading to delayed treatment and increased spread of the disease.","Mitigation":"Developing standardized protocols for telemedicine consultations including physical assessment techniques and criteria for in-person visits. Use of additional tools for remote assessment (e.g., wearable devices for vital sign monitoring).","Technologies":"Wearable health monitoring devices, telehealth platforms with integrated physical examination guides.","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Telemedicine providers, healthcare institutions."},{"Description":"Use of mobile technology for counseling and education may result in misinformation and inadequate guidance on self-isolation and protection from contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of non-compliance with preventive measures, leading to higher transmission rates of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Developing and disseminating accurate and up-to-date educational materials through mobile technology. Training healthcare professionals in providing reliable counseling and education through digital platforms.","Technologies":"Digital educational platforms with verified content, secure messaging for counseling.","People":"General public, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Health organizations, government health agencies."}]}
